caption:
🥥🌸🍍 OUR NEW Paradise Beauty Company X @nclabeauty beauty Hey Sugar Scrub is finally here! We are beyond excited to take your senses straight to paradise when you smell this intoxicating scent of creamy coconuts, light spring florals, Southern Summer nights and juicy pineapples! This scrub is a medium scent perfect for those that don’t want something too strong, but still love a good scent! You can now shop Paradise Hey Sugar Scrub by NCLA Beauty at either of our store locations and online! Shop at our Blue Ridge, GA store only and hour and a half north of Atlanta or our Copperhill, TN store only an hour from Chattanooga! 

🌸Huge shout out to our friends at @nclabeauty for this gorgeous collab! 🌸
